puzzle_question: Six we are who stood aside out of us came something sweet which made everyone happy. Who are we?
clue1_question: Whose hour has not come in the banquet?
clue2_question: First became last and last became first. What is it?
clue3_question: Who said 'take some and give it to the master of banquet'?
clue4_question: Where did Jesus reveal the first of his signs through which he revealed his glory?
